infos.value: We did it!
It is too early for celebrations.
Guoooh...!
To be this persistent... Madness must have corroded the very depths of his soul.
Raviesse. Your part ends here.
Leave the rest to us.
I will fight, too.
...No. I shall be the one to fight him.
But...
He was the enemy of my parents. He will be slain by my hands alone!
I will not allow it!
You mustn’t strike with hatred. That would deviate from the ways of the east.
Your words...are of one who is prepared for death.
Do you not understand yet?
I did not come here to be a samurai of the east.
But you have already reached the point of no return.
What...?
Fight to live.
To live...?
You have lived solely for this purpose until now, have you not?
But who would rejoice at that? You mustn't make others despair!
There are none who would weep for me...
If there are none, find them!
What...?
If you cannot find anyone, then I will be that one. So please...!
Do you understand, Raviesse? You mustn’t hate that man.
Have mercy for him.
Mercy...?
Just so.
Now, let us free him...from this prison of madness.
